languages.text: "Человечество существует лишь благодаря жертве Неумирающего. Он защищает нас от ужасов, что таятся во тьме, и потому каждый обязан служить Ему. И каждый должен..." {n}Кибелла произносит это с нажимом.{/n} "...умереть во славу Его. Поступить иначе — значит растратить впустую жизнь, дарованную Неумирающим. Стать вором. Мы помогаем людям понять это, помогаем им жить и умереть правильно".

traits.locale_text: "Человечество существует лишь благодаря жертве Неумирающего. Он защищает нас от ужасов, что таятся во тьме, и потому каждый обязан служить Ему. И каждый должен..." {n}Кибелла произносит это с нажимом.{/n} "...умереть во славу Его. Поступить иначе — значит растратить впустую жизнь, дарованную Неумирающим. Стать вором. Мы помогаем людям понять это, помогаем им жить и умереть правильно".

languages.text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."
languages.original_text: "Человечество существует лишь благодаря жертве Неумирающего. Он защищает нас от ужасов, что таятся во тьме, и потому каждый обязан служить Ему. И каждый должен..." {n}Кибелла произносит это с нажимом.{/n} "...умереть во славу Его. Поступить иначе — значит растратить впустую жизнь, дарованную Неумирающим. Стать вором. Мы помогаем людям понять это, помогаем им жить и умереть правильно".

traits.locale_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to you by the Undying One. To become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them live and die righteously."

"Our way of looking at the world is... hard to comprehend from without. For it tells us that from the moment a weaver was first aware of themselves as a child, through each new day until their final awakening, they must always remember Ahn'shini. 'Every thread ends in death.' Only one who always remembers this can serve the Undying One with honour and dignity."

"Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

"Ahn'shini is... difficult to explain to those who do not see the world as we do. It is something every weaver must remember from their first conscious moment as a child until their final awakening. 'Every thread ends in death.' This is Ahn'shini. Those who follow the Way serve the Undying One with dignity and honour."

"Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

languages.text: « L'humanité doit son existence au sacrifice de l'Empereur Immortel. C'est Lui qui nous protège des terreurs tapies dans les ténèbres. Aussi, chacun de nous a-t-il le devoir de Le servir. Et... » {n}Kibellah poursuit d'un ton plus déterminé que jamais :{/n} « ... le devoir de mourir pour Lui. Agir autrement revient à gâcher la vie qui nous a été accordée par l'Immortel, à s'abaisser au rang de vulgaire voleur. Nous aidons les autres à le comprendre. Nous les aidons à vivre et à mourir dans la vertu et la dignité. »
languages.original_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

traits.locale_text: « L'humanité doit son existence au sacrifice de l'Empereur Immortel. C'est Lui qui nous protège des terreurs tapies dans les ténèbres. Aussi, chacun de nous a-t-il le devoir de Le servir. Et... » {n}Kibellah poursuit d'un ton plus déterminé que jamais :{/n} « ... le devoir de mourir pour Lui. Agir autrement revient à gâcher la vie qui nous a été accordée par l'Immortel, à s'abaisser au rang de vulgaire voleur. Nous aidons les autres à le comprendre. Nous les aidons à vivre et à mourir dans la vertu et la dignité. »

languages.text: «La Humanidad debe su existencia al sacrificio del Emperador Inmortal. Es Él quien nos protege de los horrores de la oscuridad. Por lo tanto, todos y cada uno de nosotros tenemos el deber de servirle. Y...». {n}Kibellah añade con determinación:{/n} «... El deber de morir por Él. No hacerlo es desperdiciar la vida que el Inmortal nos ha otorgado; es robarle. Ayudamos a los demás a entenderlo. Les ayudamos a vivir y morir como es debido».
languages.original_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

traits.locale_text: «La Humanidad debe su existencia al sacrificio del Emperador Inmortal. Es Él quien nos protege de los horrores de la oscuridad. Por lo tanto, todos y cada uno de nosotros tenemos el deber de servirle. Y...». {n}Kibellah añade con determinación:{/n} «... El deber de morir por Él. No hacerlo es desperdiciar la vida que el Inmortal nos ha otorgado; es robarle. Ayudamos a los demás a entenderlo. Les ayudamos a vivir y morir como es debido».

languages.text: “人类之所以能存活下来，完全归功于不死神皇的牺牲。是祂保护了我们，让我们远离黑暗中的恐怖之物。正因如此，我们所有人都有责任侍奉祂，而且……”{n}绮贝菈坚定地说道，{/n}“……而且有责任为祂而死。若非如此，我们便等同于贼人，便是在浪费不死之神赐予我们的生命。我们会帮助其他人理解这一点，让所有人生得伟大、死得光荣。”
languages.original_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

traits.locale_text: “人类之所以能存活下来，完全归功于不死神皇的牺牲。是祂保护了我们，让我们远离黑暗中的恐怖之物。正因如此，我们所有人都有责任侍奉祂，而且……”{n}绮贝菈坚定地说道，{/n}“……而且有责任为祂而死。若非如此，我们便等同于贼人，便是在浪费不死之神赐予我们的生命。我们会帮助其他人理解这一点，让所有人生得伟大、死得光荣。”

languages.text: 「人類は不滅の皇帝の犠牲の上に存在している。私たちを恐怖の闇から守ってくださるのは皇帝です。それゆえ、私たち一人ひとりは彼に仕える義務がある。そして…」{n}キベラは意図をもって告げる。{/n}「…彼のために死ぬことは義務です。それ以外の行動をとることは、不死の者から授かった命を無駄にすること、つまり泥棒になることです。私たちは、他の人々がこのことを理解するのを助けています。正しく生き、正しく死ぬ手伝いをしているのです」
languages.original_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

traits.locale_text: 「人類は不滅の皇帝の犠牲の上に存在している。私たちを恐怖の闇から守ってくださるのは皇帝です。それゆえ、私たち一人ひとりは彼に仕える義務がある。そして…」{n}キベラは意図をもって告げる。{/n}「…彼のために死ぬことは義務です。それ以外の行動をとることは、不死の者から授かった命を無駄にすること、つまり泥棒になることです。私たちは、他の人々がこのことを理解するのを助けています。正しく生き、正しく死ぬ手伝いをしているのです」

languages.text: "Die Menschheit verdankt ihre Existenz dem Opfer des Todlosen Imperators. Er ist es, der uns vor einer Dunkelheit voller Schrecken bewahrt. Deshalb hat jeder von uns die Pflicht, Ihm zu dienen. Und ..." {n}Kibellahs Stimme wird feierlich {/n} "... die Pflicht, für Ihn zu sterben. Anders zu handeln, heißt, das Leben zu vergeuden, das uns der Todlose schenkte ... und ein Dieb zu werden. Wir helfen anderen, das zu verstehen. Wir helfen ihnen, rechtschaffen zu leben und zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."

languages.text: "İnsanlık, varlığını Ölmeyen İmparator'un fedakârlığına borçlu. Bizi dehşetin karanlığından koruyan O'dur. Bu yüzden de O'na hizmet etmek, hepimizin boynunun borcudur. Ayrıca..." {n}Kibellah, kararlılıkla lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "O'nun uğruna ölmek de öyle. Bunu yapmazsak Ölmeyen'in bize bahşettiği yaşamı boşa harcamış oluruz... Hırsız oluruz. Başkalarının da bunu anlamasına yardım ediyoruz. Erdemlice yaşayıp ölmelerine yardımcı oluyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Humanity owes its existence to the Undying Emperor's sacrifice. It is He who protects us from a darkness of terrors. Hence, each of us has a duty to serve Him. And..." {n}Kibellah says with purpose,{/n} "...a duty to die for Him. To act otherwise is to waste the life that has been given to us by the Undying One — to become a thief. We help others understand this. We help them to live and die righteously."
